description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(458).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,214,0,0,1).
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1,2,5,212,429,1070]; [n le 6 select I[n] else 214*Self(n-3)+Self(n-6): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 26 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
